doc:
Joel Crothers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joel_Crothers 0 Joel Anthony Crothers (January 28, 1941 – November 6, 1985) was an American actor. His credits primarily included stage and television work, including a number of soap opera roles, the best known being that of Miles Cavanaugh on The Edge of Night, who he played for eight years. He was also known for his roles as Joe Haskell and Lt. Nathan Forbes on Dark Shadows. Joel_Anthony_Crothers ( January_28_,_1941 – November_6_,_1985 ) was an_American_actor . His_credits primarily included stage_and_television_work , including a_number of soap_opera_roles , the_best_known being that of Miles_Cavanaugh on The_Edge of Night , who he played for eight_years . He was_also_known for his_roles as Joe_Haskell and Lt._Nathan_Forbes on Dark_Shadows .
